Title: All My Life
Writer: Mia Concio (story), Laurenti Dyogi (story), Mia Concio (screenplay), Mel Mendoza-Del Rosario (screenplay)
Actors: Aga Muhlach, Kristine Hermosa, Ricky Davao, Ces Quesada
Plot: Sam and Louie meet on a cruise and become friends. Later they meet again and recognize their love for each other.
